mapper.select: select distinct d.sidoname, d.gugunName, d.dongname from dongCode as d left join area_like as al on d.dongcode = al.dongcode where al.user_id = #{userId} and d.dongname is not null
mapper.insert: insert into area_like (user_id, dongCode, ip_address) values (#{userId}, #{dongCode}, #{ipAddress})
mapper.delete: delete from area_like where user_id = #{userId} and dongCode = #{dongCode}
